ROOT.ds27: SELECT DEVNAME, MIN(S) AS S, 1 AS IND FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT D.DEVNAME, ROUND(HOUR(A.PASSBEGINTIME) + MINUTE(A.PASSBEGINTIME)/ 60.0, 2) AS S, ROUND(HOUR(A.PASSENDTIME) + MINUTE(A.PASSENDTIME)/ 60.0, 2) AS E, CASE WHEN A.ENDWORKTIME > A.PASSENDTIME THEN ROUND(HOUR(A.ENDWORKTIME) + MINUTE(A.ENDWORKTIME)/ 60.0, 2) ELSE 0 END AS D FROM "ESDC_ODS"."T_REPAIRWRIJH" A JOIN "MONITORSIGNAL"."B_DEVICE{{0}}" D ON A.EQUIPIDS LIKE '%' || D.OMSID || '%' AND D.OMSID IS NOT NULL WHERE A.PASSBEGINTIME BETWEEN to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') || ' 00:00:00' and to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') || ' 23:59:59') A GROUP BY DEVNAME UNION SELECT DEVNAME, MAX(E)-MIN(S), 2 FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT D.DEVNAME, ROUND(HOUR(A.PASSBEGINTIME) + MINUTE(A.PASSBEGINTIME)/ 60.0, 2) AS S, ROUND(HOUR(A.PASSENDTIME) + MINUTE(A.PASSENDTIME)/ 60.0, 2) AS E, CASE WHEN A.ENDWORKTIME > A.PASSENDTIME THEN ROUND(HOUR(A.ENDWORKTIME) + MINUTE(A.ENDWORKTIME)/ 60.0, 2) ELSE 0 END AS D FROM "ESDC_ODS"."T_REPAIRWRIJH" A JOIN "MONITORSIGNAL"."B_DEVICE{{0}}" D ON A.EQUIPIDS LIKE '%' || D.OMSID || '%' AND D.OMSID IS NOT NULL WHERE A.PASSBEGINTIME BETWEEN to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') || ' 00:00:00' and to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') || ' 23:59:59') A GROUP BY DEVNAME UNION SELECT DEVNAME, CASE WHEN MIN(D) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE MIN(D)-MAX(E) END, 3 FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT D.DEVNAME, ROUND(HOUR(A.PASSBEGINTIME) + MINUTE(A.PASSBEGINTIME)/ 60.0, 2) AS S, ROUND(HOUR(A.PASSENDTIME) + MINUTE(A.PASSENDTIME)/ 60.0, 2) AS E, CASE WHEN A.ENDWORKTIME > A.PASSENDTIME THEN ROUND(HOUR(A.ENDWORKTIME) + MINUTE(A.ENDWORKTIME)/ 60.0, 2) ELSE 0 END AS D FROM "ESDC_ODS"."T_REPAIRWRIJH" A JOIN "MONITORSIGNAL"."B_DEVICE{{0}}" D ON A.EQUIPIDS LIKE '%' || D.OMSID || '%' AND D.OMSID IS NOT NULL WHERE A.PASSBEGINTIME BETWEEN to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') || ' 00:00:00' and to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') || ' 23:59:59') A GROUP BY DEVNAME
ROOT.ds354: select BB.dayid,AV,BV from ( SELECT cast(replace(b.ctime, 'DATA', '') AS number) / 4 as RN, A.CVALUE AS AV, B.CVALUE AS BV FROM (SELECT STA_DAY, YC_ID, CTIME,CVALUE FROM MONITORSIGNAL.QJ_QWFQFH_RFHQX UNPIVOT (CVALUE FOR CTIME IN (DATA4,DATA8,DATA12,DATA16,DATA20, DATA24,DATA28,DATA32,DATA36,DATA40, DATA44,DATA48,DATA52,DATA56,DATA60, DATA64,DATA68,DATA72,DATA76,DATA80, DATA84,DATA88,DATA92,DATA96)) WHERE STA_DAY = to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') AND YC_NAME = '{1}' AND TYPE = '负荷' ) A right JOIN (SELECT STA_DAY, YC_ID, CTIME,CVALUE FROM MONITORSIGNAL.QJ_QWFQFH_RFHQX UNPIVOT (CVALUE FOR CTIME IN (DATA4,DATA8,DATA12,DATA16,DATA20, DATA24,DATA28,DATA32,DATA36,DATA40, DATA44,DATA48,DATA52,DATA56,DATA60, DATA64,DATA68,DATA72,DATA76,DATA80, DATA84,DATA88,DATA92,DATA96)) WHERE STA_DAY = ADD_DAYS(to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd'),-1) AND YC_NAME = '{1}' AND TYPE = '负荷' ) B ON A.YC_ID = B.YC_ID AND A.CTIME = B.CTIME order by cast(replace(b.ctime, 'DATA', '') as number) ) AA right join ( SELECT rownum as dayid FROM dual CONNECT BY ROWNUM <= (to_date('2013-07-01 23', 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24') - to_date('2013-07-01 00', 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24')) * 24 + 1 ) BB on AA.RN = BB.dayid order by BB.dayid
ROOT.ds355: select BB.dayid as RN, AA.AV AS AV, ISNULL(AA.BV, 0) AS BV from ( SELECT N.RN+1 as RN, CASE WHEN to_number(to_char(SYSDATE,'hh24')) < N.RN + 1 THEN NULL ELSE ISNULL(M.CVALUE, 0) END AS AV, N.CVALUE AS BV FROM ( SELECT to_number(to_char(SIGNAL_TIME,'hh24')) AS RN, COUNT(1) AS CVALUE FROM ( SELECT SIGNAL_TIME FROM MONITORSIGNAL.TBSIGNALBASIS{{1}}_{{0}} WHERE RESTRAIN_FLAG = 0 AND REASON_ID<>1 AND SIGNAL_TIME>=to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') || ' 00:00:00' AND SIGNAL_TIME < to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') || ' 23:59:59' UNION SELECT STARTTIME FROM MONITORSIGNAL.TBYCOVEREVENT{{1}} WHERE STARTTIME>=to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') || ' 00:00:00' AND STARTTIME<to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') || ' 23:59:59') A GROUP BY to_number(to_char(SIGNAL_TIME,'hh24'))) M RIGHT JOIN ( SELECT to_number(to_char(SIGNAL_TIME,'hh24')) AS RN, COUNT(1) AS CVALUE FROM ( SELECT SIGNAL_TIME FROM MONITORSIGNAL.TBSIGNALBASIS{{1}}_{{0}} WHERE RESTRAIN_FLAG = 0 AND REASON_ID<>1 AND SIGNAL_TIME>=ADD_DAYS(to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd'),-1) || ' 00:00:00' AND SIGNAL_TIME < ADD_DAYS(to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd'),-1) || ' 23:59:59' UNION SELECT STARTTIME FROM MONITORSIGNAL.TBYCOVEREVENT{{1}} WHERE STARTTIME>=ADD_DAYS(to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd'),-1) || ' 00:00:00' AND STARTTIME<ADD_DAYS(to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd'),-1) || ' 23:59:59') A GROUP BY to_number(to_char(SIGNAL_TIME,'hh24')) ) N ON M.RN = N.RN order by N.RN ) AA right join ( SELECT rownum as dayid FROM dual CONNECT BY ROWNUM <= (to_date('2013-07-01 23', 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24') - to_date('2013-07-01 00', 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24')) * 24 + 1 ) BB on AA.RN = BB.dayid order by BB.dayid
ROOT.ds195: SELECT TOP 5 S_NAME || '/' ||DEVICEDESC AS DEVICENAME, CURVALUE FROM ( SELECT DEVICEID, DEVICENAME AS DEVICEDESC, STATIONIDX, MAX(MAXTEMPERATURE) AS CURVALUE FROM MONITORSIGNAL.TBYCOVER_OIL{{0}} WHERE STARTTIME BETWEEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') || ' 00:00:00' AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') || ' 23:59:59' AND DATEDIFF(SS,STARTTIME,CASE WHEN ENDTIME IS NULL THEN GETDATE() ELSE ENDTIME END)>=60 AND MAXTEMPERATURE < 100 GROUP BY DEVICEID, DEVICENAME, STATIONIDX) M JOIN "MONITORSIGNAL"."B_SUBSTATION{{0}}" S ON M.STATIONIDX = S.S_ID AND S.ISMONITOR = 1 ORDER BY CURVALUE DESC
ROOT.ds199: select type,IFNULL(eventnum, 0) as eventnum,IFNULL(infonum, 0) as infonum from ( select '跳闸' AS type,SUM(EVENTNUM) AS eventnum,SUM(INFONUM) AS infonum from "MONITORSIGNAL"."WARNINGEVENTINFO{{0}}" where EVENTTYPEID=3 and EVENTTIME between to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') || ' 00:00:00' and to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') || ' 23:59:59' union all select '操作' AS type,SUM(EVENTNUM) AS eventnum,SUM(INFONUM) AS infonum from "MONITORSIGNAL"."WARNINGEVENTINFO{{0}}" where EVENTTYPEID=2 and EVENTTIME between to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') || ' 00:00:00' and to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') || ' 23:59:59' union all select '检修' AS type,SUM(EVENTNUM) AS eventnum,SUM(INFONUM) AS infonum from "MONITORSIGNAL"."WARNINGEVENTINFO{{0}}" where EVENTTYPEID=1 and EVENTTIME between to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') || ' 00:00:00' and to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') || ' 23:59:59' union all select 'AVC' AS type,SUM(EVENTNUM) AS eventnum,SUM(INFONUM) AS infonum from "MONITORSIGNAL"."WARNINGEVENTINFO{{0}}" where EVENTTYPEID=4 and EVENTTIME between to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') || ' 00:00:00' and to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') || ' 23:59:59')
ROOT.ds200: SELECT TOP 2 DEFECTLEVEL, S.S_NAME, COUNT(1) AS INFONUM, S.CLOUDID FROM "ESDC_ODS"."T_DEFECT_MANAGE" A JOIN "MONITORSIGNAL"."B_SUBSTATION{{1}}" S ON A.STATIONID = S.OMSID AND ISMONITOR = 1 WHERE HAPPENTIME >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') || ' 00:00:00' AND DEFECTLEVEL = {0} GROUP BY DEFECTLEVEL, S.S_NAME, S.CLOUDID ORDER BY INFONUM DESC
ROOT.ds201: SELECT TOP 2 DEFECTLEVEL, S.S_NAME, COUNT(1) AS INFONUM, S.CLOUDID FROM "ESDC_ODS"."T_DEFECT_MANAGE" A JOIN "MONITORSIGNAL"."B_SUBSTATION{{1}}" S ON A.STATIONID = S.OMSID AND ISMONITOR = 1 WHERE XQ_TIME >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') || ' 00:00:00' AND DEFECTLEVEL = {0} GROUP BY DEFECTLEVEL, S.S_NAME, S.CLOUDID ORDER BY INFONUM DESC
ROOT.ds_frequent: SELECT top 4 to_char(start_time,'hh24:mm:ss'), n.deptdesc || ' ' || b.signal_name, b.cc as rule FROM MONITORSIGNAL.DBDEFECT_SIGNAL{{0}} a JOIN (select accordid, signal_name, sum(case when reset_time is null then 1 else 2 end) as cc from ({{1}}) m where reason_id = 5 AND ISMANAGE = 1 AND signal_time between to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') || ' 00:00:00' and to_char(signal_time,'yyyy-mm-dd') || ' 23:59:59' group by accordid, signal_name) b on a.accordid = b.accordid left join Psgraph_data.Tdepartment{{0}} n on cast(a.stationidx as varchar) = n.departname WHERE a.defecttype IN(3,9) and start_time between to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') || ' 00:00:00' and to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') || ' 23:59:59' order by rule desc
ROOT.ds_misssignal: SELECT top 4 TO_CHAR(happentime, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AS StartTime, b.devicename || '跳闸' as describe, signalcontent as signalName,'aaa' as rowclass FROM TLOSTSIGNALINJUMP{{0}} A LEFT JOIN tjumpmsg{{0}} b on a.accidentid = b.accidentid WHERE b.happentime between to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') || ' 00:00:00' and to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') || ' 23:59:59' order by StartTime
ROOT.ds_event: SELECT DISTINCT B.CLOUDID FROM "MONITORSIGNAL"."STATIONEVENTINFO{{0}}" A LEFT JOIN "MONITORSIGNAL"."B_SUBSTATION{{0}}" B ON A.STATIONIDX=B.S_ID WHERE EVENTTIME=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')
